title: Seven Wonders of the Ancient World (Modern Scholar)
description:
SEVEN WONDERS OF THE ANCIENT WORLD (The Modern Scholar series)
14 lectures on 7 CDs

by Jennifer Tobin, associate professor of classical archaeology at the University of Illinois at Chicago.  How they were built, why they were built, how they were regarded and by whom . . . also how they found their way onto The Lists of Wonders, etc. Drawing from archaeology and classical literary records. 

Course guide (PDF) included.

01 The Lists of Wonders
02 The Great Pyramids at Giza - Part 1
03 The Great Pyramids at Giza - Part 2
04 The Walls of Babylon
05 The Hanging Gardens of Babylon
06 The Statue of Zeus at Olympia
07 The Temple of Artemis at Ephesus - Part 1
08 The Temple of Artemis at Ephesus - Part 2
09 The Mausoleum at Halicarnassus - Part 1
10 The Mausoleum at Halicarnassus - Part 2
11 The Colossus of Rhodes
12 The Lighthouse of Alexandria
13 The Seven Wonders in the Roman Period
14 The Seven Wonders in Later Periods

14 MP3 files @ 128 kbps
